alert.note: Alert for Grayson; Hardin; Hart (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 06 at 4:59PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Hart, northeastern Grayson and southwestern Hardin Counties through 530 PM EDT/430 PM CDT/... At 459 PM EDT/359 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Leitchfield, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of north central Hart, northeastern Grayson and southwestern Hardin Counties, including the following locations... Rock Creek, Seven Corners, Saint Paul, Peonia, Flint Hill, Snap, Clarkson, Royal, Lacon and Millerstown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
